meanings.sent1: I love using elemis products for my skincare routine.
meanings.sent2: Elemis is known for its high-quality skincare products.
meanings.sent3: My friend gifted me elemis skincare, and now my skin feels like royalty!
meanings.sent4: Using elemis is like pampering your skin with a touch of luxury.
meanings.sent5: Elemis skincare makes me feel like a celebrity with its premium ingredients.

meanings.sent1: After a long week, I treated myself to an elemis spa day.
meanings.sent2: Elemis spa treatments are so relaxing and rejuvenating.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a new person after experiencing the elemis spa treatment.
meanings.sent4: The elemis spa treatment was like a soothing escape from reality.
meanings.sent5: The elemis spa session left me feeling refreshed and pampered.

meanings.definition: A specific type of massage technique.
meanings.sent1: The elemis massage technique helped relieve my muscle tension.
meanings.sent2: Elemis massage is gentle yet effective in easing stress.
meanings.sent3: I never knew a massage could feel so good until I tried elemis.
meanings.sent4: Elemis massage technique is like a magic touch that melts away all worries.
meanings.sent5: After the elemis massage, I felt like I was floating on clouds.
